channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Detroit suburb agrees to $3.25M settlement in case of woman found alive in body bag
item.description: A Detroit suburb has agreed to a $3.25 million settlement with the family of a young woman who had been declared dead at her home but was alive when h...

item.title: Joseph McGettigan, prosecutor in Jerry Sandusky and John du Pont cases, dies at 76
item.description: Joseph McGettigan III, a Pennsylvania prosecutor known for convicting Jerry Sandusky and John du Pont, has died at the age of 76

item.title: Man accused of stalking a Wisconsin Supreme Court justice is sentenced to probation in plea deal
item.description: A Wisconsin man accused of sending the state Supreme Court's chief justice intimidating emails has been sentenced to probation

item.title: Alaska pilot who landed plane after panel blew out says Boeing unfairly blamed him
item.description: The Alaska Airlines pilot who was praised as a hero for safely landing a plane after a door plug panel flew off shortly after takeoff in 2004 is suing...

item.title: 3 Big Changes for Retirement Planning this year
item.description: For retirement savers and retirees, the new year brings more than the usual inflation adjustments to retirement contributions
